attributes.action: to replace the mps second home allowance with  parliament supplied accommodation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The second home allowance to be scrapped and replaced by accommodation that is supplied by parliament. This accommodation would be made available to all MPs who live outside of London free of charge. Those MPs who wish not to use this facility would have to pay for their accommodation out of their own pocket with no refund from the State.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
